item.title: Agent-based modelling: lizards & rock, paper, scissors.
item.description: Rock Paper Scissors NEED TO UPDATE WITH MY CODE, THIS IS SOMEONE ELSEâ€™S. JUST A PLACEHOLDER. Rock Paper Scissors In this second example we are going to use the same game, but this time several individuals will play against each other. To make it more interesting individuals are organised on a lattice network. Thus, they can only play with their direct neighbors. If they lose, they have to take over the strategy of the winner and vice versa.
